    dgamevfs.fs


    class FSDir: dgamevfs.vfs.VFSDir;

    Directory in the physical filesystem.

    Note that paths behave as in the backend filesystem.
    For example, if you are working with Windows, paths are not case sensitive.

    this(string name, string physicalPath, Flag writable = cast(Flag)true);

    Construct an FSDir.

    Parameters:
    string name Name of the directory in the VFS.
    string physicalPath Path of the directory in the physical filesystem.
    Flag writable Is this directory writable? FSDir can't determine whether you have permission to write in a directory - you must specify this explicitly.
    class FSFile: dgamevfs.vfs.VFSFile;

    VFSFile implementation representing a file in the file system.
